attributes.action: Call a General Election and let the people decide
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we the people did not elect Mr Brown as our  prime minister, and it seems that things have gone from bad to worse, forget a leadership election, let the people decide who they would like to see lead our country not the labour party decide, if there is going to be a leadership contest, why not just call a genereal election at the same time.....

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
